title: New: 0.1 – Worm/Child Sing-A-Long
content:
Maybe it’s his non-google friendly name or his admirable lack of self-promotion, but I’m still mystified as to how 0.

1 aka Bob Streckfuss is seemingly so below most people’s radars. With twenty six beautiful, twisted and unflinchingly unique tracks on his soundcloud, it’s not as if there’s a lack of material to dive into, and certainly no omission of quality. New track Worm/Child Sing-A-Long is a gorgeous, atmospheric number, playing to Streckfuss’s sampled angelic vocals and deep synth lines, almost like Sigur Ros meeting Balam Acab. If you haven’t already, I thoroughly recommend that you immerse yourself in the music of 0.1.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
